location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 248: Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to William Taylour Thomson, Her Majesty's Chargé d'Affaires at the Court of Persia, Tehran

mods.abstract: In this letter Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, informs William Taylour Thomson, Her Majesty's Chargé d'Affaires at the Court of Persia, of the seizure of several consignments of indigo, which form part of the plundered cargo of the Centaur.
